attributes.action: If it is found the BBC Trust approved the severance overpayments then the money MUST be clawed back from the Trust Members involved.
attributes.additional_details: What is going on at present is a blatant attempt to confuse and obfuscate so that 'nobody will be found to have been at fault'.  These people are NOT politicians, they are employees and as such they must be accountable and responsible.  If that is not to be the case then the BBC must be closed and shut down -IMMEDIATELY.

rejection.details: This is, currently, a matter purely for the BBC.  However, the Government is aware of the situation and is awaiting further developments.
